nodes.text: Around the year 3966 BBY, the resurgent Sith Empire faced a potential uprising in a space sector under the rule of the warlord Ugroth. In response, the Empire dispatched an Imperial force under the command of a Sith Lord, Darth Nyriss, with the objective of subduing the insurrection. Ugroth swore his allegiance to Nyriss at the time, and at some point after that, the Sith Lord acquired a bust of the warlord. Twelve years later, the Sith Pureblood Sechel told the Sith Lord Scourge of the subjugation.
The subjugation of Ugroth's sector was first mentioned in the 2011 novel The Old Republic: Revan, written by Drew Karpyshyn.
